text: A forced marriage is a marriage which happens against the will of one or both partners. A forced marriage is different from an arranged marriage: In an arranged marriage, the parents or other third parties will help finding a suitable partner. International human rights law including International Covenant on Civil and Political RightsArticle 23, section 3 also prohibit unfree marriage without consent of each person. == Notes == == Related pages == *Child marriage *Violence against women Category:Marriage Category:Human rights abuses
title: Forced marriage
